ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13

Class DailyRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13.DailyRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DailyRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    DailyRecord is a simple Java object that represents the daily dashboard and the rules that govern access to and updates of this data, but also contain the model for goals.
    • Is necessary because JSON call, for a date, contains both that daily info plus the daily goals
    • Basically, this Java object holds the combined daily record listed in JSON object from API call
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
